comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: OP I think you should work on your presentation here because that is what attracts prospective clients to you. To be honest there is nothing tangible in what you have presented here for the members to see as it is not convincing.You did not mention your fee, medium of payment, currency, no o escrow no nothing and you want members to slide in your telegram. For your information people would think you are a scammer and would not want to deal with you.
